statements: SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE product_id = 'xyz';
SELECT customer_id, quantity, total_amount FROM customer_purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, sum(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM customer_purchase_history GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, total_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(total_amount) AS total_amount_spent FROM customer_purchase_history GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount_spent FROM customer_purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY avg_amount_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Purchases WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, purchase_date FROM Customer_Purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT recommendation_text FROM Product_Recommendations WHERE recommendation_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_amount FROM Customer_Purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, recommendation_text FROM Product_Recommendations WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Customer_Purchases WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM Customer_Purchases WHERE product_id = 5 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT cp.customer_id, pr.recommendation_text FROM Customer_Purchases cp JOIN Product_Recommendations pr ON cp.product_id = pr.product_id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase FROM Customer_Purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchase > 100;
SELECT cp.customer_id, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM Customer_Purchases cp JOIN Product_Recommendations pr ON cp.product_id = pr.product_id GROUP BY cp.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_data WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT product_id, name, category FROM product_data ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM product_data WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE quantity > 1 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_data WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT product_id, name, category, price FROM product_data WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, p.name AS product_name, ph.purchase_date FROM customer_data c JOIN purchase_history ph ON c.customer_id = ph.customer_id JOIN product_data p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY ph.purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, category, price FROM product WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer.name, product.name, purchase.purchase_date FROM customer JOIN purchase ON customer.customer_id = purchase.customer_id JOIN product ON purchase.product_id = product.product_id;

SELECT customer.name, product.name, purchase.quantity, purchase.total_price FROM customer JOIN purchase ON customer.customer_id = purchase.customer_id JOIN product ON purchase.product_id = product.product_id WHERE purchase.total_price < 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customer WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, category, price FROM product WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT customer.name, product.name, purchase.quantity, purchase.total_price FROM customer INNER JOIN purchase ON customer.customer_id = purchase.customer_id INNER JOIN product ON purchase.product_id = product.product_id;

SELECT customer.name AS customer_name, product.name AS product_name, recommendation.recommended_date FROM customer INNER JOIN recommendation ON customer.customer_id = recommendation.customer_id INNER JOIN product ON recommendation.product_id = product.product_id WHERE recommendation.recommended_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products ORDER BY product_category DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, recommended_product_id FROM recommendations WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, recommended_product_id, recommendation_date FROM customers JOIN recommendations ON customers.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
